thread.title: Through Your Lens: Waterfalls Around The World
thread.title_full: Through Your Lens: Waterfalls Around The World

author: Chris McGonigal
title: Through Your Lens: Waterfalls Around The World
text:
Through Your Lens: Waterfalls Around The World Truly beautiful. Chris McGonigal Photo Editor, The Huffington Post Alexandra Ma Editorial Fellow, The Huffington Post Posted: 07/23/2015 
The WorldPost's " Through Your Lens " series brings you mesmerizing photos taken by social media users in different countries around the world every week. This week, we explore waterfalls around the world. 
Waterfalls have always been one of the best reminders of the beauty and serenity that nature can bring. From the lone bird flying across Skógafoss, South Iceland, to rainbow sightings in Victoria Falls, these photos are guaranteed to stun you, wherever in the world you may be. 
Check out the WorldPost on Instagram for more vibrant photography from across the globe. Tag your Twitter and Instagram photos with #WorldPostGram so we can feature them in our next post. May 20, 2015 at 3:15pm PDT Skógafoss, South Iceland Jan 12, 2015 at 9:23am PST Victoria Falls, between Zimbabwe and Zambia Jul 20, 2015 at 12:26am PDT Gullfoss, Iceland Jul 15, 2015 at 1:58am PDT Bowen Falls, Milford Sound, New Zealand Apr 6, 2015 at 1:10am PDT Queen Mary Falls, Brisbane, Australia Jul 20, 2015 at 6:01am PDT Iguazu Falls, Argentina Jul 19, 2015 at 9:58am PDT Large Waterfall, Plitvice Lakes National Park, Croatia Jul 17, 2015 at 2:59pm PDT Svartifoss, Skaftafell National Park, Iceland Feb 22, 2015 at 11:58am PST Angel Falls, Venezuela Jul 20, 2015 at 5:25am PDT Dao Falls, Samboan, Cebu
